Happy Birthday! The Waitangi Tribunal turns, 50 but there’s no cause to celebrate - John Tamihere https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/happy-birthday-the-waitangi-tribunal-turns-50-but-theres-no-cause-to-celebrate-john-tamihere/3OB6JQLDO5HWTEF6S2D7F62TG4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/happy-birthday-the-waitangi-tribunal-turns-50-but-theres-no-cause-to-celebrate-john-tamihere/3OB6JQLDO5HWTEF6S2D7F62TG4/ The Waitangi Tribunal turns 50 - happy birthday to you. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:42:58 +0000 Waitangi Tribunal members, from left, Pou Temara, Timothy Castle, Ron Crosby and Chief Judge Wilson Isaac in 2012.
Bankwood School dental trailer theft: X-ray machines, laptops, drills, medication stolen in Hamilton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bankwood-school-dental-trailer-theft-x-ray-machines-laptops-drills-medication-stolen-in-hamilton/USN2WXZYHFHWBAODI6EEAI4NJ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bankwood-school-dental-trailer-theft-x-ray-machines-laptops-drills-medication-stolen-in-hamilton/USN2WXZYHFHWBAODI6EEAI4NJ4/ Police believe the dentist was plundered between April 8 and 10, and are asking for info. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:32:11 +0000 Detective Sergeant Matthew Lee said police believed a dental clinic, parked at Bankwood School in Chartwell, Hamilton, was plundered between April 8 and April 10.
Hope Project could recall just one-fifth of 1.4 million copies of Pat Mohi’s digitally replaced head https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/hope-project-could-recall-just-one-fifth-of-14-million-copies-of-pat-mohis-digitally-replaced-head/ATXAWWFLH5A3BN7I4TBWCD7CMI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/hope-project-could-recall-just-one-fifth-of-14-million-copies-of-pat-mohis-digitally-replaced-head/ATXAWWFLH5A3BN7I4TBWCD7CMI/ Te Rina KowhaiMohi was startled by the altered photo in the pamphlet. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:24:52 +0000 Left image - manipulated photo of Pat Mohi, Right image - original photo of Pat Mohi.
Pharmac proposes to fund new blood cancer multiple myeloma drug pomalidomide https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pharmac-proposes-to-fund-new-blood-cancer-multiple-myeloma-drug-pomalidomide/GNFWAR36PRB7VC6VQ6JA7U4TC4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pharmac-proposes-to-fund-new-blood-cancer-multiple-myeloma-drug-pomalidomide/GNFWAR36PRB7VC6VQ6JA7U4TC4/ Nicholas JonesOverall, more than 800 patients would benefit, Pharmac said. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:16:44 +0000 Nichola Oakenfull, of Myeloma New Zealand, and son Alex. Oakenfull says she is "delighted" with the Pharmac proposal to fund pomalidomide and widen access to lenalidomide. Photo / Supplied
Tokoroa rest home, nurses told to apologise to whānau for failures in care https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tokoroa-rest-home-nurses-told-to-apologise-to-whanau-for-failures-in-care/CG4ENY2WPRPRDZLXSO7YYNHPE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tokoroa-rest-home-nurses-told-to-apologise-to-whanau-for-failures-in-care/CG4ENY2WPRPRDZLXSO7YYNHPE/ Sonya BatesonThe man had a fall inside the rest home and died two weeks later.Tue, 23 Apr 2024 06:39:28 +0000 A Tokoroa rest home has breached codes for care of an elderly respite patient. Photo / 123rf
Head Hunter’s Mercedes-Benz G Wagon seized, Muriwai Beach incidents lead to nine other vehicles being uplifted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/head-hunters-mercedes-benz-g-wagon-seized-muriwai-beach-incidents-lead-to-nine-other-vehicles-being-uplifted/UYZGEOOINBEBHNI75FZYO5YV7E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/head-hunters-mercedes-benz-g-wagon-seized-muriwai-beach-incidents-lead-to-nine-other-vehicles-being-uplifted/UYZGEOOINBEBHNI75FZYO5YV7E/ Raphael FranksThe gang member was charged with four driving offences for two incidents on Muriwai Beach. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 06:11:50 +0000 Police have seized a Mercedes-Benz G Wagon, a luxury SUV that can cost almost $400,000 new, in relation to dangerous-driving incidents on Muriwai Beach. The car pictured was seized in an earlier, unrelated raid. Photo / New Zealand Police
Court of Appeal rejects Kiribati national’s latest bid to avoid deportation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/court-of-appeal-weighs-in-on-kiribati-nationals-decade-long-fight-against-deportation/DODRAFVBOFBKPNAGIKSPLUFBTU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/court-of-appeal-weighs-in-on-kiribati-nationals-decade-long-fight-against-deportation/DODRAFVBOFBKPNAGIKSPLUFBTU/ Tara ShaskeyThe Kiribati national arrived in New Zealand in 2008. Two years later, he raped a woman. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 06:00:00 +0000 The Kiribati national was served with a deportation liability notice in 2013.
WoolWorks: Flood-hit wool scourer factory re-opens in Awatoto, near Napier after Cyclone Gabrielle https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/woolworks-countrys-largest-wool-scourer-plant-re-opens-in-awatoto/6DEACU2YKFCMJBJ46VNYH4LNPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/woolworks-countrys-largest-wool-scourer-plant-re-opens-in-awatoto/6DEACU2YKFCMJBJ46VNYH4LNPY/ Gary Hamilton-IrvineSeventy sparkies helped get the factory re-opened at the height of the rebuild. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 05:30:00 +0000 WoolWorks NZ chairman Rob Hewett (left) and president Nigel Hales at the Awatoto factory during the official re-opening. Photo / Warren Buckland
Taupō GP opens special medical service for survivors of sexual assault https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-gp-opens-special-medical-service-for-survivors-of- Sex-assault/EKMPAGNYYFDDZJR2H3EARFEHCU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-gp-opens-special-medical-service-for-survivors-of- Sex-assault/EKMPAGNYYFDDZJR2H3EARFEHCU/ Milly FullickThe free service aims to help with 'letting go of guilt and shame'. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 05:30:00 +0000 Dr Frances Czuba has established a Sexual Assault Medical Service in Taupō.
Beach Haven armed kidnapping accused Jamie Perfect pleads not guilty as police continue to hunt for accomplice https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/beach-haven-armed-kidnapping-accused-jamie-perfect-pleads-not-guilty-as-police-continue-to-hunt-for-accomplice/AGA4SJTCGBB7FJNAWYPOBDIE6A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/beach-haven-armed-kidnapping-accused-jamie-perfect-pleads-not-guilty-as-police-continue-to-hunt-for-accomplice/AGA4SJTCGBB7FJNAWYPOBDIE6A/ George BlockHis accomplice, who was shot during the kidnapping, remains at large.
